A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As many have already said\, the important bits of the plot didn't quite make sense. The writers really let the series and the fans down with this one\, which is unfortunate because Episode 7 really got it off to a great start. For us Star Wars fans\, we can only hope that the failures of Episode 8 didn't completely ruin the current series. Here's to looking ahead to Episode 9. Cheers.
